content: original pattern english was designed so i could make a present to cheer up a friend who had undergone surgery to remove a cyst on her ovary the pattern has since been used widely in america to help protest unfair legislation targeting women s reproductive rights the pattern is now also being used as the mascot for an advocacy group in germany 1 fighting for a woman s right to be sterilised the german translation includes instructions on making ovaries and adding the knots in the fallopian tubes which are the symbol of the group 1 https //www selbstbestimmt-steril de
